name: Tether (itch) (daspruthvi96)
description:
2 players. 2 controls. 1 rope. TONS OF FRUITS!

‘Tether’ is a co-op game in which two players are bound together by a rope. You are forced to work together to evade the fruits that are falling atop your heads!

Not that you can’t eat them… But if you eat too many, you'll burst! And you can’t let those fruits break the tether!

There is no timer; only each other. Work together and survive for as long as possible.

'Tether' is one of the jam entries for the 48-hour United Game Jam 2020; the theme was 'Two.'

How to play:

  1. Player 1 uses the Left Arrow. Player 2 uses the Right Arrow.
  2. Press the arrows to change directions.
  3. Press and hold the button to keep going in the direction.
  4. Leave the button to stop.
  5. Don't eat more than 2 fruits, and don't let them hit the rope!
  6. Collect the green box to reduce your size and gain back some speed.

Team Members:

  • Designer: daspruthvi96
  • Artist: Forty-2
  • Musician: Bingzor3
  • Programmer: keshav9999

Fun Facts:

  • We forgot about the first 24 hours of the jam. Hence, our team name was dubbed 'The Dudes Who Forgot About the First 24 Hours'.
  • It is the artist's and the musician's first time doing jams.

Extras:

  • 'Gulp' SFX by jabameister
  • Unity w/ TextMeshPro
  • Aseprite
  • FL Studio
